review: never use it,  shows cost too much, wish I never ordered it
author: Chris Becker

review: Good product, I have problems with windows 8.1, it crash ever 30 minutes
author: Giovanni De Los Reyes

review: LOVE, love, love it!!!!!!  I keep asking myself why I didn't buy it sooner.  Everything about it is fantastic.  Available movies, programs, series, are seemingly endless.  I am in AWE!
author: Gem's Girl

review: Pretty pleased with this low-priced, but full-feature gadget. Streams beautifully and gives me options I don't have on my locked down Samsung Smart TV, notably Amazon Prime Video.
author: pddaddy1959

review: Another streaming device.  Does a great job.  Just one complaint in that you need another electrical outlet to power the dongle power supply.  Would have been nicer of the TV USB could have supplied the required power.
author: Stanley J. Wynman "Wynman"

review: Excellent investment! So much easier than hooking up the laptop!
author: Heather M Browne

review: I already have the Amazon Fire TV on my main TV in the living room.  Thanks to Amazon Prime Day, I got this one as an addition for my bedroom TV.  It is awesome, as I already knew it would be!!  Has everything from Prime.
author: Linda Bondy

review: I did read reviews about how frustrating it can be, when sometimes it wont connect. But, I just turn off my tv and turn it back on, and the stick works just fine. It's finicky, but that's probably why there's already a newer version out. It's a good price and makes my dumb tv into a smart tv. AKA netflix device. It's legit a good price and does what it's supposed to, 99% of the time.
author: biznatchplz
